name: Persistence
description:
"Hello, how are you?"

A random monk approached me at the U-Bein Bridge Myanmar.

I wondered and asked him, "You're english is so good, where did you learnt it?"

"I come to this bridge every morning to talk to tourists so I can improve my english." that Monk told me.

Such persistence, I thought to myself.

I suggested to him, "Do you mind for a photograph?"

"But why?" he asked.

"I try to photograph people along my travels, so I can improve my portrait photography skills." I replied.

-

Captured in Mandalay, Myanmar
